text: (Allah) yinjiza ijoro mu manywa akaninjiza amanywa mu ijoro. Yanacishije bugufi izuba n’ukwezi (ku bw’inyungu z’ibiremwa); buri kimwe kizenguruka (mu mbibi zacyo) ku gihe cyagenwe. Uwo ni Allah, Nyagasani wanyu; ubwami ni ubwe. Naho ibyo musenga bitari we, ntacyo bitunze habe n’agashishwa k’urubuto rw’itende
